dct_title_s: Siege of Vera Cruz by the U.S. troops under Major General Scott, in March 1847, from surveys made by Major Turnbull, Captains Hughes, McClellan, & Johnston, Lieutenants Derby & Hardcastle, Topl. Engineers
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Shows the port of Vera Cruz, outlying areas, and locations of United States troops. Includes text with statistics on "Worth's, Twiggs, and Patterson's Divisions." North oriented toward upper left corner of map. Date from map.
dct_creator_sm: United States. Army. Corps of Topographical Engineers
